course_title: Research Methods for Sport and Health Sciences

001.comments: The course consists of both web based synchronous and asynchronous learning. The online synchronous class will be held on Mon, 9-10:30 am.Course outline may be found under "Graduate Course" at: http://kin.educ.ubc.ca/current-students/current-graduate-students/#Courses-0

description: Interpretation and evaluation of research methods and scientific findings related to coaching sciences and exercise and health-related professions.
